text: A pleasant life truly!... It so happens that I have an Italian who is perhaps the best writing this letter he heard of the fall of the Whigs, and the temporary assumption of the government by the Duke of Wellington.
handwritten_text: A pleasant life truly!... It so happens that I have an Italian who is perhaps the best writing this letter he heard of the fall of the Whigs, and the temporary assumption of the government by the Duke of Wellington.
